thread.title: After defiant exit, Trump reconsiders TPP

title: After defiant exit, Trump reconsiders TPP
text:
After defiant exit, Trump reconsiders TPP Thursday, April 12, 2018 - 02:01 
U.S. President Donald Trump has asked his trade advisers to look at re-joining the Trans Pacific Partnership, a multinational trade pact he withdrew the United States from early last year, Republican Senators said after a meeting with Trump on Thursday.
